consent_preferences_advertising_descript: We work with third party advertising networks that collect information using tracking technologies, including technology designed for mobile devices called software development kits ("SDKs") and cookies (referred to collectively as "tracking technologies") to help make the advertising you see on our sites and elsewhere on the internet more relevant and targeted, as well as to provide promotional content which we hope will be relevant to you. They help optimize advertising campaigns, measure their effectiveness, and provide a more personalized experience. They may also be used to limit the frequency of ads or to determine if a specific ad has been shown to a user.
consent_preferences_analytical_descripti: We use performance and analytical tracking technologies, including technology designed for mobile devices called software development kits ("SDKs") and cookies (referred to collectively as "tracking technologies"). They play an important role in helping us understand and improve the performance of our app. They also collect information about how you interact with our app, such as the pages you visit, the time you spend on each page, and any error messages you encounter, as well as traffic information about your device and websites that direct you to us. Data gathered through these tracking technologies helps us analyze traffic modes, identify popular content, and optimize the overall user experience. We enhance website performance, troubleshoot issues, and deliver relevant and engaging content to our browsing users.
consent_preferences_essential_descriptio: We use tracking technologies, including technology designed for mobile devices called software development kits ("SDKs") and cookies (referred to collectively as "tracking technologies") which are essential for the proper functioning of your app. These are used to enable important features such as providing you with secure access, user ID verification, and so on, and play a vital role in ensuring that the game works properly. They also ensure that your app operates efficiently and delivers the intended functionality, and enable us to remember your preferences and settings, such as language preferences and login information.
consent_privacy_content: We and our partners access and store your device information for personalized recommendations and marketing promotions.\n\nClick Accept to allow all or by managing personalization options. For more information, see our %s.

reactivate_accoun_notice_cn:
Your account is currently in the "deletion confirmation period."
Do you want to reactivate your account and log in?
Please note that the deletion process will be canceled after reactivation.
※The deletion confirmation period is 3 days from the date on which you request the deletion.
reactivate_accoun_notice_os:
Your account is currently in the "deletion confirmation period."
Do you want to reactivate your account and log in?
Please note that the deletion process will be canceled after reactivation.
※The deletion confirmation period is 30 days from the date on which you request the deletion.
